<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_universal_dg_email_search"> <x_snc_universal_dg_email_search action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <chance_read>25</chance_read> <name>Example 1: Simple Random Results</name> <number_of_recipients>20</number_of_recipients> <query_trigger_string>subject=Email Search Simple Random Results</query_trigger_string> <recipient_domain>s-mart.com</recipient_domain> <response_json/> <response_script><![CDATA[/* Set the string variable ResponseJSON to contain raw JSON text in the format below.
ResponseJSON = '{ "result":[ { "delivered_date":"", "message_id":"ae57df24b9ab4e9cb8c5466753fd6f05@exchange.secops.local", "read_status":"", "recipient_address":"suzzane.baker@secops.local", "sender":"Administrator@secops.local", "trackedEvents":"receive, submit" }, { "delivered_date":"", "message_id":"bd2791d56c474871b72a3aef38f9396e@exchange.secops.local", "read_status":"", "recipient_address":"suzzane.baker@secops.local", "sender":"Administrator@secops.local", "trackedEvents":"receive, submit" } ] }'; */]]></response_script> <response_type>Simple</response_type> <sender_domains>evilcorp.com,ecorp.com</sender_domains> <sender_usernames>elliot,darlene,tyrell,whiterose,m.robot,dom,kmitnick,pmorris</sender_usernames> <sys_created_by>alex.cox</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2018-12-21 23:11:16</sys_created_on> <sys_id>527a88950f22630095d741fce1050ef0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>alex.cox</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2018-12-27 21:16:02</sys_updated_on> <trigger_is_regex>false</trigger_is_regex> </x_snc_universal_dg_email_search> </record_update>
